data.name: SERVER_ERROR_CONNECTION
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API due to an issue with connecting to the platform's servers. Check that your internet connection is available and no other networking issues are occurring.

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT_NO_ACCOUNT_PAYMENT_TYPE
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API due to supplier organisation's customer account not having any On Account payment method set.

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT_ON_HOLD
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API due to the customer account in the supplier's organisation being on hold and not allowing for further trading activity.

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT_OUTSIDE_BALANCE_LIMIT
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API due to the customer account's balance in the supplier's organisation being over the allowed limit. Not further trading can occur with the account until payments have been made against the account's balance.

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_DATA_IMPORT_ABORTED
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API due to the data import being aborted. It may have been aborted by a person or by the platform.

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_DATA_IMPORT_BUSY
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API due to another data import already running or the API is busy processing other requests.

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_DATA_IMPORT_MAX_IMPORTS_RUNNING
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API due to the maximum number of data imports being run over a short period of time. Wait a while before calling the endpoint again and consider calling the endpoint less often.

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_DATA_IMPORT_MISSING_IMPORT_TYPE
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API due to no data type set indicating the kind of data being imported.

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_DATA_IMPORT_NOT_FOUND
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API due to an incorrect or unsupported data type being set.

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_DATA_JSON_MALFORMED
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API due to the data being imported in the JSON data format not able to be processed, because it has not been correctly formed. Check for syntax errors with the JSON data.

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_DATA_JSON_WRONG_CONTENT_TYPE
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API due to the content type in the request headers not being set to application/json, specifying that data imported is in the JSON data format.

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_ESD_DOCUMENT_HEADER_MALFORMED
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API due to the Ecommerce Standards Document uploaded missing an opening bracket in its JSON data.

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_ESD_DOCUMENT_HEADER_MISSING_ATTRIBUTES
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API due to the Ecommerce Standards Document being uploaded missing the dataRecords attribute that should contain the record data to import.

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_ESD_DOCUMENT_NO_RECORD
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API due to Ecommerce Standards Document not containing any records to import. Look to add one or more records to the document.

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_ESD_DOCUMENT_UNSUCCESSFUL
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API due to Ecommerce Standards Document failing to import. Check that the document was correctly formed.

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_INCORRECT_API_CREDENTIALS
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API due to incorrect API credentials being given for the organisation.

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_INCORRECT_DATA_TYPE
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API due to the data type specified not being supported or of the correct type.

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_INCORRECT_RECORD_TYPE
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API, due to the wrong type of record being given.

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_INSUFFICIENT_CREDIT
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API due to the organisation having insufficient trading tokens in the platform to process the request.

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_INVALID_API_ACTION
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API, due to the endpoint being called not being found or no longer existing.

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_INVALID_NOTIFICATION_CATEGORY
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API due to an incorrect notification category been given to it.

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_INVOICE_LINE_NOT_MAPPED
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API due to a line within the invoice not able to be matched up to one of the customer's products, labour, or downloads.

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_INVOICE_LINE_TAXCODE_NOT_MAPPED
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API due to a line's taxcode within the invoice not able to be matched up to one of the customer's taxcodes.

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_INVOICE_SURCHARGE_NOT_MAPPED
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API due to a surcharge within the invoice not able to the matched up to one of the customer's surcharges.

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_INVOICE_SURCHARGE_TAXCODE_NOT_MAPPED
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API due to a surcharge's taxcode within the invoice not able to be matched up to one of the customer's taxcodes.

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_IO
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API due to an IO (Reading or Writing) error.

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_MALFORMED_URL
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API due to URL being not correctly set.

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_MAX_SEARCHES_REACHED
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API, due to the maximum number of searches allowed being reached within the allowed time frame. Wait a short period of time before trying to perform another search.

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_NO_DATA_RETURNED
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API, due to the platform unable to receive any data from the connected business system.

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_NO_ORG_CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT_ASSIGNED
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API due to no customer account in the supplier's organisation able to be found with the given account code.

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_NO_ORG_CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT_SET
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API due to the supplier organisation having no active customer accounts assigned to the customer organistion.

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_NO_ORG_PEOPLE_TO_NOTIFY
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API due to no people being configured in the organisation to receive the notification.

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_NO_ORG_SUPPLIER_ACCOUNT_ASSIGNED
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API due to no supplier account in the customer's organisation able to be found with the given account code.

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_NO_ORG_SUPPLIER_ACCOUNT_SET
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API due to the customer organisation having no active supplier accounts assigned to the supplier organistion.

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_ORDER_MAPPED_PRODUCT_PRICE_NOT_FOUND
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API due to not being able to price a product in the supplier's organisation.

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_ORDER_MAPPED_PRODUCT_STOCK_NOT_AVAILABLE
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API due to one or more of a supplier's products being out of stock and unable to be ordered.

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_ORDER_PRODUCT_NOT_MAPPED
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API due to not being able to find a matching product in the supplier's organisation.

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_ORG_DOES_NOT_EXIST
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API due to the organisation given not able to be found in the platform, or it is not active.

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_ORG_INACTIVE
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API due to the organisation being inactive or deleted from the platform.

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_ORG_NOT_ENOUGH_CREDITS
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API due to the organisation not having enough trading tokens.

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_ORG_NOT_FOUND
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API since no organisation could be found matching the ID given.

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_ORG_NOT_SELLING
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API due to the organisation's Trading Status does not allow it to sell on the platform.

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_PERMISSION_DENIED
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API due to permission being denied to access data, or save data, or access the endpoint.

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_REQUEST_PROTOCOL
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API due to an issue with the protocol used to call the endpoint.

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_RESPONSE
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API due to the server returning a bad response. The platform's API may be unavailable, under heavy load, or a network connection error could be occurring.

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_SECURITY_CERTIFICATE_NOT_FOUND
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API due to the organisation's security certificate not able to found or does not exist.

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_SENDER_DOES_NOT_MATCH_CERTIFICATE_COMMON_NAME
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API, due to the common name set in the organisation's security certificate not matching the IP address of the internet connection used to call the endpoint

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_SESSION_INVALID
data.value: An error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API due to the API session not existing or previously destroyed.

data.name: SERVER_ERROR_UNKNOWN
data.value: An unknown or non-specified error occurred when calling SQUIZZ.com's API.

data.name: SERVER_FAILURE
data.value: An error occurred when SQUIZZ.com's API was called.

data.name: SERVER_SUCCESS
data.value: SQUIZZ.com API was successfully called.
